faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about My Guide Digital
faq.a1: My Guide Digital is an AI-powered digital welcome booklet that centralizes all useful information for your travelers and makes them autonomous during their stay.
faq.q2: Who is My Guide Digital for?
faq.a2: My Guide Digital is for Airbnb hosts, concierge managers and travel professionals who want to digitize their welcome and optimize their relationship with travelers.
faq.q3: What are the main benefits for an Airbnb host?
faq.a3: An Airbnb host can create a professional welcome booklet in minutes, reduce repetitive questions, save several hours per week and increase their 5-star reviews thanks to My Guide Digital.
faq.q4: How does My Guide Digital's AI help me daily?
faq.a4: My Guide Digital's AI automatically answers your travelers' frequently asked questions, guides them in using the accommodation or services and avoids you being constantly solicited.
faq.q5: Can I test My Guide Digital for free?
faq.a5: Yes, you can test the solution for free using the "Try the solution for free" button present in several places on the site.
faq.q6: How does My Guide Digital improve the customer experience?
faq.a6: By providing clear and instant access to all information, My Guide Digital improves traveler comfort, reduces friction and helps you get more 5-star reviews.
faq.q7: Is My Guide Digital suitable for concierges with multiple properties?
faq.a7: Yes, My Guide Digital allows concierge managers to automate communication for multiple accommodations and standardize welcome quality across the entire portfolio.
faq.q8: Does My Guide Digital help reduce my operational costs?
faq.a8: By automating responses and digitizing the welcome booklet, My Guide Digital reduces time spent on traveler support and therefore your operational costs.
faq.q9: Is there an affiliate or referral program with My Guide Digital?
faq.a9: Yes, you can offer a promo code to your community to give them 15% off the subscription, which allows you to earn money with My Guide Digital.
faq.q10: Where can I find My Guide Digital pricing and terms of use?
faq.a10: Pricing is available via the "Our Pricing" page and legal information via the "Legal Notice" and "Terms and Conditions" pages at the bottom of the site.

why.block1Desc: Your welcome booklet is 100% digital and viewable on smartphone, tablet or computer. Your travelers access all essential information with a simple QR code scan, without downloading anything.
why.block2Title: Full customization to match your brand
why.block2Desc: Integrate your logo, colors and visual identity to offer a professional welcome consistent with your brand. Every detail reflects your establishment.
why.block3Desc: No more repetitive paper printing. With My Guide Digital, only the QR code is printed. Reduce your ecological footprint while modernizing your welcome.
why.block4Desc: AI chatbot available 24/7, automatic multilingual translation, usage statistics and digitalized check-in: everything is designed to enrich your travelers' experience.

features.subtitle: Every feature is designed to improve your travelers' welcome.
features.ctaTest: üöÄ Try My Guide Digital for free
features.f1Desc: Welcome travelers from around the world with automatic translation of your booklet into multiple languages. Content automatically adapts to each visitor's language for a smooth and natural experience.
features.f2Desc: Measure the impact of your booklet with detailed consultation data. Identify the most viewed sections, peak usage moments and optimize your content accordingly.
features.f3Desc: Modify your information in real-time from your dashboard. Easily duplicate your booklets to manage multiple accommodations without starting from scratch. A considerable time saver.
features.f4Title: Local recommendations and points of interest
features.f4Desc: Share your best addresses, restaurants, activities and tourist sites nearby. Enrich your travelers' stay by offering them personalized and authentic advice.
features.f5Desc: Add clickable links to your partners, activity bookings or online shop. Create new revenue opportunities while improving your guests' experience.
features.f6Desc: Adapt every module of your booklet: colors, fonts, logo, custom categories and tailored advice. Offer a digital welcome that truly looks like you.
features.f7Desc: A simple scan from the smartphone is enough to access your entire booklet. Place the QR code at the entrance, on the bedside table or in your welcome email. No app required.
features.f8Desc: Your intelligent assistant instantly answers your travelers' questions, day and night. Wi-Fi code, schedules, instructions, recommendations: everything is processed automatically from your content.
features.f9Desc: Easily add photos, videos, PDF documents and texts. Reorganize your modules in a few clicks to create a complete and attractive booklet, without any technical skills.
